#Text=The group 's tactics have been criticized .
#Text=Co-founder Pacheco , who is no longer with PETA , called them " stupid human tricks . "
#Text=Some feminists criticize their campaigns featuring the Lettuce Ladies and " I 'd Rather Go Naked Than Wear Fur " ads as objectifying women .

column1: #Text=Of their Holocaust on a Plate campaign , Anti-Defamation League Chairman Abraham Foxman said " The effort by PETA to compare the deliberate systematic murder of millions of Jews to the issue of animal rights is abhorrent . "
#Text=( Newkirk later issued an apology for any hurt it caused ) .

#Text=Perhaps most controversial amongst politicians , the public and even other animal rights organizations is PETA 's refusal to condemn the actions of the Animal Liberation Front , which in January 2005 was named as a terrorist threat by the United States Department of Homeland Security .

#Text=David Shankbone attended the pre-release screening of I Am An Animal at HBO 's offices in New York City on November 12 , and the following day he sat down with Ingrid Newkirk to discuss her perspectives on PETA , animal rights , her responses to criticism lodged against her and to discuss her on-going life 's work to raise human awareness of animal suffering .
#Text=Below is her interview .
#Text=The HBO film about her life
#Text=How did you feel about the film ?
#Text=[ Laughs ]
#Text=Oh…um…I did n’t know what it was going to be .
#Text=I had expectations because I did trust Matthew , but I realize there has to be a certain more interesting bent to it .
#Text=Like my hate mail and my will .
#Text=Getting naked for Times Square .
#Text=Trying to draw me out so that I will cry .
#Text=Those are the kinds of things I think HBO wants to have because those are the things that will hold an audience better than just the facts .
#Text=So much was left out , and I did n’t know what was going to be left out , so that was interesting .
#Text=Newkirk and Matthew Galkin , who directed I Am an Animal , the story of Newkirk 's life .
#Text=Image : David Shankbone .
#Text=You are pretty media savvy ; was that okay with you that they crafted the film the way they did ?
#Text=You have to make allowances , because you know you will not be directing and producing it yourself , so there is some give and take .
#Text=I hoped what would be shown is the good of the behind-the-scenes PETA , and the footage , and giving a glimpse to people of why we do what we do .
#Text=You have to take the bits that you would n’t necessarily put in your own film .
#Text=Many people when they hear about PETA think they are an organization that is more concerned with the well-being of chickens than they are with the well-being of humans .
#Text=How would you respond to that ?
